name: Spy
skills: Deception +5, Insight +4, Investigation +5, Perception +6, Persuasion +5, Sleight of Hand +4, Stealth +4

special_abilities.name: Cunning Action.
descriptions: On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

special_abilities.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn).
descriptions: The spy deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the spy that isn't incapacitated and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The spy makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
